name: mock20-testing-eval
description: Creates an example Roll20 project that uses the Mock20 module to test its scripts.

scripts.test: npm run compile_script && npm run compile_module && mocha --recursive
scripts.compile_script: echo "" > MyScript.js && find ./Scripts -type f -exec cat {} + >> MyScript.js
scripts.compile_module: echo "require('mock20')" > MyModule.js && cat MyScript.js >> MyModule.js && echo "MOCK20endOfLastScript();" >> MyModule.js

author: Kyle Smith <kyledavidady@gmail.com>
